CustomField.formula: IF((TEXT(GES_Project_Manager__c) == "Mike Porter"),"MPorter@ges.com", IF((TEXT(GES_Project_Manager__c) == "Sarah Montagne"),"smontagne@ges.com", IF((TEXT(GES_Project_Manager__c) == "Nick Ward"),"NWard@ges.com", IF((TEXT(GES_Project_Manager__c) == "Chris Wright"),"cwright@ges.com", IF((TEXT(GES_Project_Manager__c) == "Camille Da silva"),"cdasilva@ges.com", IF((TEXT(GES_Project_Manager__c) == "Antonio Ferraro"),"aferraro@ges.com", IF((TEXT(GES_Project_Manager__c) == "Alexa Kelly"),"alexak@ges.com", IF((TEXT(GES_Project_Manager__c) == "Heather Medus"),"hmedus@ges.com", IF((TEXT(GES_Project_Manager__c) == "Ana Wainman"),"awainman@ges.com", "")))))))))
CustomField.label: GES Project Manager Email
